abstract:
SE:MINAR
Wednesday. 13 November
9:30· 10:30
14th Floor Meeting Room
Carl Malamud - Director o'f the Digital Resources Institute at the
University of Colorado and head of the 'Bruno Project' which
converted and made available the CCI standards on internetworked
servers - is visiting the ITU again.
He has offered to give a brief
seminar focussing both on the very initial statistics of the Project, as
well as current InterneVnetworking developments.
As those who attended Mr. Malamud's first seminar
